title:u/pandapaxxy's PsiOps and World Drop Weapons, Season of the Risen Breakdown
description:Originally found at https://www.reddit.com/r/sharditkeepit/comments/tfhbos/psiops_and_world_drop_weapons_season_of_the_risen/

// Piece of Mind
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "What would make Piece of Mind better than say Time-Worn Spire or a Gridskipper alternative? Well, it can get barrels to boost it above Time-Worn Spire, and its perk pool is better for neutral builds in PvE. [...] It wonâ€™t have the straight up consistency as Time-Worn Spire but it will have a higher ceiling for using it in all activities." Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:pve,mkb,controller

// Piece of Mind
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB): "Time-Worn Spire has better range and consistency perks, while you really need arrowhead break to clean up the recoil direction to a usable degree. It does allow for other consistency in the form of perpetual motion and moving target or elemental capacitor; it falls just a little short compared to the zoom of Time-Worn Spire. Both are equally good options." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,mkb

// Piece of Mind
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / Controller): "Time-Worn Spire has better range and consistency perks, while you really need arrowhead break to clean up the recoil direction to a usable degree. It does allow for other consistency in the form of perpetual motion and moving target or elemental capacitor; it falls just a little short compared to the zoom of Time-Worn Spire. Both are equally good options." Recommended MW: Stability.|tags:pvp,controller

// Thoughtless
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "Thoughtless might be the best weapon in this DLC. Incredible utility in solo and group activities and itâ€™s craftable so you can really get exactly what you want. In PvE there will be nothing that trumps overflow and firing line for group activities. If you really donâ€™t like overflow then you can opt for rapid hit instead. Focused fury will be the go-to perk for solo activities or where you donâ€™t have enough people for firing line to activate." Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:pve,mkb,controller

// Thoughtless
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB): "It directly competes with and arguably beats Shephardâ€™s Watch in almost every category. Thoughtless has better base stats across the board but a slightly lower zoom. Depending on what you like your zoom to be at it could be a moot point, but with the recent adjustment to lower zoom sniper rifles they are still a competitive option. [...] The only reason to hang onto Shephardâ€™s Watch would be to have an under pressure / opening shot roll in the eventual snapshot change Bungie teased." Recommended MW: Range or Handling.|tags:pvp,mkb
dimwishlist:item=4067556514&perks=1840239774,3142289711,3643424744,957782887

// Thoughtless
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / Controller): "It directly competes with and arguably beats Shephardâ€™s Watch in almost every category. Thoughtless has better base stats across the board but a slightly lower zoom. Depending on what you like your zoom to be at it could be a moot point, but with the recent adjustment to lower zoom sniper rifles they are still a competitive option. [...] The only reason to hang onto Shephardâ€™s Watch would be to have an under pressure / opening shot roll in the eventual snapshot change Bungie teased."
